rooms.description: Serves as the main entry point leading into the living areas and connects to the kitchen.
Large open-plan area with Bohemian decor elements such as patterned rugs, eclectic furniture, and vibrant colors. Incorporates natural lighting from large windows along one side.
Adjacent to the living room; designed for both casual dining and entertaining guests.
Spacious kitchen with modern yet rustic Bohemian finishes. Features open shelving and a central island.
Quiet retreat for the homeowners with Vastu-influenced positioning to enhance positive energy; includes an ensuite bathroom.
Guest bedroom designed with Bohemian styling and ample storage space.
General bathroom for the household, positioned conveniently near both master and guest bedrooms.

openings.description: Durable material with decorative design elements that echo Bohemian style.
Energy efficient windows with wooden frames to enhance natural light while maintaining privacy.
Provides a seamless transition from the living space to the outdoor terrace area, integrating indoor and outdoor spaces.

terrace.name: Rooftop Terrace
terrace.description: Bohemian-themed outdoor space with comfortable seating areas, ambient lighting, planters, and decorative elements that promote relaxation and connectivity with nature. Ensures adherence to Vastu by aligning the terrace with auspicious directions.
